comment:
{
    "VARIABLES": "Let x be the number of medication patches and y be the number of anti-biotic creams",
    "CONSTRAINTS": [
        "3x + 5y \leq 400",
        "5x + 6y \leq 530",
        "y \geq 2x",
        "x + y \leq 100",
        "x \geq 0",
        "y \geq 0"
    ],
    "OBJECTIVE": "Maximize 3x + 2y"
}
